1 True , 64 , Kodi Smit-McPhee
2 Hello !	Hello , Kodi Smit-McPhee ! Would you like to have a small caramel macchiato again ?
3 I will try something else . May I have a noisette ?	Which size ?
4 Large cup .	Would you like anything else with that ?
5 Just the drink , please .	So that would be a large noisette . Is that right ?
6 Oh I am sorry , but I would like medium instead .	Sure ! So that would be a medium noisette . Is that right ?
7 On second thought , I would have small instead .	Sure ! So that would be a small noisette . Is that right ?
8 Sounds good !	Your order will be ready at the next counter , Kodi .
9 Thanks !	Have a nice day !
